atom:feed.atom:title: Twitter / existdb
atom:feed.atom:subtitle: Twitter updates from eXist XML Database / existdb.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: The 1.4 release has been delayed by a week (Nov 2nd) due to a few show stoppers which were found recently (and have mostly been fixed now).
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: The 1.4 release has been delayed by a week (Nov 2nd) due to a few show stoppers which were found recently (and have mostly been fixed now).

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Fixed WebDAV lock issue in 1.4rc, which could block more and more threads until eXist came to a complete halt.
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Fixed WebDAV lock issue in 1.4rc, which could block more and more threads until eXist came to a complete halt.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: #oXygen #XML editor 11 was just released at http://www.oxygenxml.com - see http://bit.ly/v4sjo for the new additions. (via @georgebina)
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: #oXygen #XML editor 11 was just released at http://www.oxygenxml.com - see http://bit.ly/v4sjo for the new additions. (via @georgebina)

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: @abcoates eXist has a persistent DOM which can be used from Java in embedded mode. But I would prefer to use XQuery to restrict my view.
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: @abcoates eXist has a persistent DOM which can be used from Java in embedded mode. But I would prefer to use XQuery to restrict my view.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: RT @wolfgangm http://twitpic.com/jenou - Using eXist's new XQuery debugger from emacs (via DBGP protocol)
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: RT @wolfgangm http://twitpic.com/jenou - Using eXist's new XQuery debugger from emacs (via DBGP protocol)

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: @JeniT yeah, looks like your name appears in several of my MODS entries ;)
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: @JeniT yeah, looks like your name appears in several of my MODS entries ;)

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: eXist 1.4 release candidate is available, featuring new full text index, URL rewriting, XProc, query engine redesign ... http://bit.ly/FvOgf
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: eXist 1.4 release candidate is available, featuring new full text index, URL rewriting, XProc, query engine redesign ... http://bit.ly/FvOgf

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: @skruk please post the patch on the sf.net server (patch tracker)
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: @skruk please post the patch on the sf.net server (patch tracker)

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Tomcat deployment issue fixed. Now back to testing and packaging the release...
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Tomcat deployment issue fixed. Now back to testing and packaging the release...

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Wasted the entire morning trying to get the documentation to display properly in internet explorer 8.
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Wasted the entire morning trying to get the documentation to display properly in internet explorer 8.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Fixed the last major bug on our todo list for the release: xmlrpc "result set unknown or timed out" issue.
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Fixed the last major bug on our todo list for the release: xmlrpc "result set unknown or timed out" issue.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Completed missing documentation on url rewriting, versioning and kwic display.
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Completed missing documentation on url rewriting, versioning and kwic display.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Highlights: function documentation, xml validation, relative module resolving..... heading to the release!
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Highlights: function documentation, xml validation, relative module resolving..... heading to the release!

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Uploaded a new preview of the upcoming eXist-db release to http://www.exist-db.nl/files (rev9849).
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Uploaded a new preview of the upcoming eXist-db release to http://www.exist-db.nl/files (rev9849).

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: The 1.4 release candidate has been delayed until middle of next week. Documentation is missing and some developers are currently abroad.
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: The 1.4 release candidate has been delayed until middle of next week. Documentation is missing and some developers are currently abroad.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: A new preview of #existdb 1.3/trunk has been uploaded to http://www.exist-db.nl/files (exist-1.3.0dev-rev9621)
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: A new preview of #existdb 1.3/trunk has been uploaded to http://www.exist-db.nl/files (exist-1.3.0dev-rev9621)

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Warning..... on https://sourceforge.net/projects/exist/ an old version of the software is linked. Please download via http://exist-db.org
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Warning..... on https://sourceforge.net/projects/exist/ an old version of the software is linked. Please download via http://exist-db.org

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: Achieved nice performance wins for queries on the Lucene-based index. Text and NGram indexes benefit from improvements in query optimizer.
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: Achieved nice performance wins for queries on the Lucene-based index. Text and NGram indexes benefit from improvements in query optimizer.

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: @kngenie wrong jvm? Wrong download? The jar is confirmed to be ok...
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: @kngenie wrong jvm? Wrong download? The jar is confirmed to be ok...

atom:entry.atom:title: existdb: @avernet Sorry, this new feature does not work as advertised. Just committed a quick fix: http://bit.ly/Y6XVs
atom:entry.atom:content: existdb: @avernet Sorry, this new feature does not work as advertised. Just committed a quick fix: http://bit.ly/Y6XVs
